Name: Sleigh Runner
About the game: To make this winter and christmas time special, we released a fantastic and easy to play Sleigh Runner game. In this game the player sits on Santa's Sleigh and has to collect the lost packages that were stolen from Santa's office. During the collection of packages the player has some enemies that will take snow ball shots at the player in order to protect their packages. So do your best to collect all the presents for Santa and Achive the highest score is it will be saved in Steams High-Score panel. Beste Christmas wishes, Team RetroBullet.
